Package cyberLib.io

Class Input

java.lang.Object
cyberLib.io.Input
public class Input extends Object
A class full of static methods to handle input from the terminal. It uses the java.util.Scanner to receive data from the console. The methods have dedicated code to catch exception and handle non formatted text and non desired inputs.

    • askString

      public static String askString(String title)
      Static method for asking the user a String input with a title being printed before.
      Parameters:
      title - The phrase that it's displayed before it asks the input
      Returns:
      The string passed through the console

      public static String askString()
      Static method for asking the user a String input.
      Returns:
      The string passed through the console

    • askInt

      public static int askInt(String title)
      Static method for asking the user a int input. If the scanner fails to recognize the int a red message stating This is not an int is displayed.
      Parameters:
      title - The phrase that it's displayed before it asks the input
      Returns:
      The int passed through the console

      public static long askHexOrInt(String title)
